radiographic_examinations.findings: No pancreatic pseudocyst, irregularity of the pancreatic duct, or abnormal pancreatic calcification observed.
No anatomical findings suggesting chronic pancreatitis.
Thickness of the intima-media complex was normal (0.5 mm) and a minimum atherosclerotic plaque (1.3 mm) in the bilateral carotid bulb at the age of 53 years.
Neither abnormal calcification nor atherosclerotic plaque in the aorta.
